channel.title: How do i change quest tab?
channel.description:
Hey moparscape! I need help once again :(
I wana ask you guys how to change the quest tab text Change This \/ [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14m8fpf.jpg[/img]
Thanks guys Ill rep! (whoever helps first though)

item.title: How do i change quest tab?
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

[quote=“JoshRawly, post:10, topic:400813”]Still can find.[/quote]Okay, in client.java server sided.
Ctrl + F: public void process() {
Then under that add:

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title

Save, then compile.

Edit: Then if you want the quest titles to be blank add something like this:

	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7346);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 17510);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 6027);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 18306);

item.title: How do i change quest tab?

item.source: How do i change quest tab?

item.title: How do i change quest tab?
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

Client.java server sided,

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title

That will change the title of your quest tab to how many players are online.
If you just want them to be blank:

getPA().sendFrame126("", 7346);

Read full topic
